textField.textFieldExpression: "<style size=\"7\" pdfFontName=\"Helvetica\">"+$P{personalEssencePool}.toString()+"</style><style size=\"6\" pdfFontName=\"Helvetica\"> Total / </style><style isUnderline=\"true\" pdfFontName=\"Helvetica\">_____</style><style size=\"6\" pdfFontName=\"Helvetica\"> Available</style>"

"<style size=\"7\" pdfFontName=\"Helvetica\">"+$P{peripheralEssencePool}.toString()+"</style><style size=\"6\" pdfFontName=\"Helvetica\"> Total / </style><style isUnderline=\"true\" pdfFontName=\"Helvetica\">_____</style><style size=\"6\" pdfFontName=\"Helvetica\"> Available</style>"

"<style pdfFontName=\"Symbol\">\u00A8</style> <style size=\"7\" pdfFontName=\"Helvetica\">Health: </style><style size=\"6\" pdfFontName=\"Helvetica\">Bashing damage heals 1 health level per 3 hours. Lethal damage healing rate varies (-0 = 6 hours; -1 = 2 days; -2 = 4 days; -4 = 1 week; Incapacitated = 1 week). Double these times if not resting. Aggravated damage heals at the same rate as lethal but cannot be healed magically.</style>"

"<style pdfFontName=\"Symbol\">\u00A8</style> <style size=\"7\" pdfFontName=\"Helvetica\">Bleeding: </style><style size=\"6\" pdfFontName=\"Helvetica\">Caused by L damage. Stamina (difficulty 1) to close wounds by force of will or lose 1L every few minutes.</style>"

"<style pdfFontName=\"Symbol\">\u00A8</style> <style size=\"7\" pdfFontName=\"Helvetica\">Infection: </style><style size=\"6\" pdfFontName=\"Helvetica\">Caused by L damage. Stamina + Resistance (difficulty 1 or more) to resist.</style>"

"<style pdfFontName=\"Symbol\">\u00A8</style> <style size=\"7\" pdfFontName=\"Helvetica\">Death and Dying: </style><style size=\"6\" pdfFontName=\"Helvetica\">When character reduced below Incapacitated, expires after (Stamina - 1 per health level below incapacitated) turns.</style>"
"<style pdfFontName=\"Symbol\">\u00A8</style> <style size=\"7\" pdfFontName=\"Helvetica\">Marking Damage: </style><style size=\"6\" pdfFontName=\"Helvetica\"> Bashing, Lethal, Aggravated</style>"
"<style size=\"6\" pdfFontName=\"Helvetica\" forecolor=\"#404040\">Original sheet design by Voidstate 2006\n(http://www.voidstate.com)</style>"
"<style size=\"6\" pdfFontName=\"Helvetica\" forecolor=\"#404040\">Exalted 2006 by White Wolf, Inc.\n(http://www.white-wolf.com)</style>"
